Donation info for B612 asteroid tracking.

The B612 Foundation tracks asteroids for potential threats to Earth, donations to their cause can be made at https://donatenow.networkforgood.org/B612foundation/donate

Links will be posted once the sales are live.
I will be donating to B612! Glad to see Squad active in its local community as well.
